name: Star Wars Vocabulary
description: English vocabulary words learned from Star Wars
context: Learn English words that viewers commonly encounter while watching Star Wars movies. These words help build vocabulary through the galactic adventure context.

words.meaning: events that will necessarily happen to someone in the future
a person learning a trade or skill from a master
an act of violent resistance to an established government
an extensive group of states under a single supreme authority
a union or association formed for mutual benefit
a state where power is held by elected representatives
a governing body of elected or appointed members
a senior government official or head of government
thinking deeply or focusing one's mind for spiritual purposes
the state of being calm, peaceful, and untroubled
the desire to do something wrong or unwise
the quality of having experience and good judgment
the ability to do something frightening or difficult
the capacity to accept delay or suffering without getting angry
a condition in which different elements are equal or correct
giving up something valued for the sake of something else
the action of saving or being saved from sin or evil
a prediction of what will happen in the future
a feeling of expectation and desire for a positive outcome
something left or handed down by a predecessor
